summary: Admin authentication system with simple username/password login
architectural_notes: Admin panel uses simple username/password authentication without additional verification steps
known_issues: Admin panel verification process not working properly

existing_features.title: Remove any verification or multi-step authentication process from the admin login flow. The admin panel should authenticate using only username and password credentials.
Ensure that admin access is granted only when both the username and password match the actual stored credentials (username: 6352174912, password: 63521). Invalid credentials should be rejected.
Streamline the authentication process to be direct and simple with no additional processing steps or complexity beyond credential validation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Simplify admin panel login - remove verification, use only username and password authentication
